/api/admin/.*.description: Grants access to all admin endpoints if user has the 'admin' client role.

/api/dashboard/data.description: Grants access to the dashboard for any authenticated user with the 'user' client role.

/api/workbench/.*.description: Context-aware rule for the workbench. Requires the 'user' role, but delegates final decision to the endpoint.

/api/business-objects/.*.description: Grants access to the generic business object endpoints for any authenticated user.
